summary.description:
Dynamic Meta-Storms enables comprehensive taxonomic and phylogenetic comparison of shotgun metagenomes at the species level.

Dynamic Meta-Storms calculates comprehensive taxonomic and phylogenetic distances/dissimilarities of shotgun metagenomes at the species level.

Dynamic Meta-Storms calculates comprehensive taxonomic and phylogenetic distances dissimilarities of shotgun metagenomes at the species level.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'Meta-Storms' (bio.tools/meta-storms), 'DMS', 'metagenomes', 'beta-diversity'
summary.name: Dynamic Meta-Storms
